name: image_fetch
body:
### Welcome to the image_fetch page.

```
$ bundle install
$ ./image_fetch.rb
usage: ./image_fetch.rb service username [to PATH]
$ ./image_fetch.rb twitpic gizzard
```

### Support or Contact
@gizzard
tagline: small ruby script to fetch images from various web services
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
